courseName: Biomedical Science (Blood Science) - MSc (IBMS accredited), PgCert, PgDip

The programme builds on existing, undergraduate knowledge in basic science and applying it to clinical, diagnostic and research applications relevant to Clinical Biochemistry, Medical Immunology, Haematology and Transfusion
